name: DUCK TRAIL'S!!!!
description:
Duck trails is a simple puzzle game the revolves around a duck trying to get into it's pond...

The player will have no full control of the ducks movement and have to get pass the stage with what it the stage provides..

Get pass the spikes and don't get stuck!! 

HAVE FUN!!!!

  1. Debuking(Project leader , Programmer)
  2. RTHiro(Main artist)
  3. CakeFlurry(Level Designer , Programmer)
  4. Darrrrrell(Extra helping hand)

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

you can restart by pressing button R. If the stage is too hard you can select in the main menu .Some stages are impossible due to bug , simply play the other level if that happens by going back to the menu
